system.descriptionText: "Vehicle" is in reality a flesh and blood creature. Critical Effects may need translation by GM (such as using character Crit Effects). Repairs may still use Tech-Use if a cybernetic animal but may also need Medicae. Requires Wrangling Special use of Survival Skill in order to control and ride. If animal is Bestial it may run in fear.
